casebody.data:
Officer Vance PLUMHOFF, et al., petitioners,
v.
Whitne RICKARD, a Minor Child, Individually, and as Surviving Daughter of Donald Rickard, Deceased, By and Through Her Mother Samantha Rickard, as Parent and Next Friend. No. 12-1117. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 15, 2013.

*636Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit granted.
